issuetype.description: An improvement or enhancement to an existing feature or task.
issuetype.name: Improvement

fields.description: Currently null is being checked for twice (once when deciding what kind of optional to send to the passed function, and then again inside that function) when it only need be checked once
fields.summary: [C++] Avoid util::optional in favor of separate inlineable functions in arrow/visitor_inline.h
